features.title: Break the Boundaries
features.subtitle: We hear your concerns. But at FlowCode, they are no longer obstacles.
features.card1_desc: We have the strongest AI code editor. You don't need to know syntax; AI handles all the logic and structure. Focus on 'What', not 'How'.
features.card2_desc: AI will help refine your thoughts. You just need a simple, instinctual impulse—that spark of inspiration. Leave the rest to us.
features.card3_desc: No need to learn complex traditional software, just Natural Language. With stable Google Sync and free Cloudflare deployment, everything is built for your creative freedom.
features.vision_quote_1: I hope everyone can use AI to do what they love.
features.vision_quote_2: This is the last era of traditional coding,
features.vision_quote_highlight: and the first era of AI creation.
features.vision_desc: A perfect AI workflow makes your dreams easier to realize than you imagine. Join history.
